sourcesContent:
<!-- This is a generic component that deletes the object that is passed in, then
passes back the object so it can be removed from the displayed array. -->

<template>
      <button
        type="button"
        class="btn btn-warn"
        @click="deleteObj">
        Delete
      </button>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
export default {
  name: "DeleteObj",
  inject: {
    platformId: { default: ""},
    platformFeeId: { default: ""},
    scenarioId: {default: ""}
  },
  props: {
    objectToDelete: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    },
    portfolioId: {
      type: Number,
      required: false
    },
    objectType: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      error: null
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async deleteObj() {
      if (this.objectType == "scenario") {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.objectToDelete.id}/`;
        await apiService(endpoint, "DELETE")
      } else if (this.objectType == "platform") {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.objectToDelete.id}/`;
        await apiService(endpoint, "DELETE")
      }
      else if (this.objectType == "investment") {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/platformfees/${this.platformFeeId}/portfolios/${this.portfolioId}/investments/${this.objectToDelete.id}/`;
        await apiService(endpoint, "DELETE")
      }
        this.$emit("delete-object", this.objectToDelete)
    }
  },
}
</script>
